mapper.select: select *,(select count(1) from t_sys_permission where pid=a.id) childcount from t_sys_permission a

select distinct p.*,(select count(1) from t_sys_permission where pid=p.id) childcount from t_sys_permission_role spr,t_sys_role_user sru,t_sys_permission p where spr.role_id = sru.sys_role_id AND spr.permission_id = p.id AND sru.sys_user_id=#{userId} GROUP BY p.id ORDER BY order_num is null ASC,order_num ASC
